meanings.definition: A traditional Malay garment worn as a shirt or dress.
meanings.sent1: She wore a beautiful baju to the wedding.
meanings.sent2: The baju she wore was colorful and elegant.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally put on his baju inside out.
meanings.sent4: Her baju was like a rainbow of fabric.
meanings.sent5: The intricate details on her baju caught everyone's eye.

meanings.definition: A piece of clothing that covers the upper body.
meanings.sent1: The baju he wore was too tight.
meanings.sent2: She bought a new baju for the special occasion.
meanings.sent3: The baju seemed to have a mind of its own, refusing to fit properly.
meanings.sent4: His baju was a shield against the cold wind.
meanings.sent5: The soft fabric of her baju felt comforting against her skin.
